@chrisbiscardi @JeremyMorrell @Netlify The tricky bit is that every site in that monorepo would share and be triggered to rebuild by the same git hook. So all sites would rebuild no matter which one changed. Maybe the build script of each site could test git logs to see if files in its scope where part of the commit?
